attributes.action: Not allow MP's to call each other "My honourable..." - Until they have proved their honour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that MP's calling each other by "My honourable gentleman / gentlewoman on the....." should not be allowed untill the British people agree,by referendum,  that they have earned that title

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
